name: config-driven-helper
description: Enable driving cookbooks that are not normally config driven to be so

recipes.config-driven-helper::apache-sites: Propagates sites from node config to web_app
recipes.config-driven-helper::nginx-sites: Propagates sites from node config to nginx site
recipes.config-driven-helper::mysql-users: Creates mysql users using database cookbook
recipes.config-driven-helper::mysql-databases: Creates mysql databases using database cookbook
